message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this product. I think it would be incredibly valuable to you. I'm asking for $18,000. What do you think?
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I understand the value of the product, but I am only able to offer $15,000 for it. I hope we can come to an agreement.
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $18,000 is closer to my bottom line. Could you meet me halfway at $16,500?
Hello Alice, thank you for considering my previous offer. I'm willing to go up to $15,500 for the product. I hope this meets somewhere in the middle.
